Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 54 mins
features: 【Rainbow Gaming Keyboard】With 3 lighting modes to be chosen, and the brightness can be adjusted. Provide vivid experiences for games. And you can also turn off the backlight when you do office works.

【High Quality 104 Keys Full-Size Keyboard】All metal base and highly-resistant ABS plastic keycaps for longevity, and durability. And OMOTON Gaming keyboard with the number pad greatly improves your productivity.

【Wear Resistant and Removable Keycaps】Stepped Key-layout keyboard, comfortable and unobstructed typing experience, long-lasting use without fatigue. Removable design for quick cleaning without worrying about dust or dirt.

【26 Keys Anti-Ghosting &Win Lock Function】 Each key is controlled by an independent switch, giving you very accurate response even when you press multiple gaming keys simultaneously. Ideal for gamers, typist, etc.
【12 Media Hotkeys】 Control your background track without switching out of your game. Allow you to quickly access to calculator,player and email etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beset 65% keyboard out there
reviews.reviewText: If you're on a really tight budget for a 65% mechanical keyboard then this is the one for sure. The blue switches feel Really premium and the different light modes this keyboard have are amazing. Definitely worth the price, I would even pay more for this keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Newly released product
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. They are alright for under $30, functional. They are not true RGB where the less are just different colors on the rows. The led animations are cool, but not very functional except for the dedicated game mode. Metal build plastic on the bottom, not a lot of flex for a cheap mechanical keyboard.Checked the back of the keyboard and it was recently QC 08/20 so these have been in the market only recently.Which confuses me why there are reviews of a different product on this keyboard.It is alright for the price for a fairly well built keyboard. Just wished that I could have the whole keyboard light up one color instead of the rgb rows which are somewhat annoying. I would recommend you get a wrist rest if you are buying these.Cannot day what they will be in a couple months but so far 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the money come on u cant go wrong.. thing works perfect ,lights up ,and is less then $20 !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I didn't have super high hopes for this keyboard when I purchased it, but I decided to pull the trigger because it's actually going to be used by a little guy and I figured he wouldn't notice the difference between this and my Red Dragon. To my surprise, I barely notice the difference when it comes to banging away on these keys! They definitely feel like blue keys to me and there's actually less of a metallic ring at the bottom that you experience with some keyboards.The led's are bight and the character key lettering is crisp. The instructions are clear and it's super easy to change the lighting pattern. There is a setting that allows you to customize the lighting pattern for gaming, and you *can* set individual keys. The built in patterns are pretty basic, but do the job if you want to mix it up. Now of course at 1/2 the price of some of the other keyboards out there, you will notice some differences and one of those is the lack of any SUPER customizable patterns or settings but what counts for me is that this keyboard goes way beyond being just a static rainbow keyboard with simple variations of rainbow. I certainly recommend this keyboard for those wanting great value for their money

reviews.reviewText: The keys are already losing the letters as the black is peeling away

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mine doesn't look like this
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard I received does not look like the pictures. The lights do not shine through the letters, can hardly see what the letters are. Same manufacturer, just a different keyboard. Nowhere's near quiet, but I do like the clicking sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is NOT an RGB keyboard.
reviews.reviewText: This is just a back-lit keyboard, RGB would mean you could change the keys colors. You CAN NOT change any colors of any keys.
